content.question: In the second paragraph, “She’d never once heard of anybody eating one” suggests which of the following about Lila’s past relationship to her surroundings?

choices.label: She has found inspiration in the beauty of the natural world.
She has been dissatisfied with the rural setting in which she has lived.
She has never felt emotionally attached to a particular place.
She has primarily been focused on the practical aspects of survival.

content.answer: She has primarily been focused on the practical aspects of survival.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
